data.name: Queer and Chill
data.detailed_description:
Queer & Chill is a spicy and challenging puzzle full of pride flags, and lots of diversity. Improve your skills while discovering new and exciting ways to match people based on their sexuality.
Learn, evolve, and most of all, be curious.

FEATURES

Party After Party:
Test your match skills with more than 80 levels and challenges.

Charming by Nature :
People of all shades, sizes and colors.

Rainbow Celebration:
Discover different gender identities and sexualities: demisexual, asexual, autosexual, pansexual, abrosexual and aromantic people will be coloring the party with their pride flags.

Dress Code:
Unlock spicy and funny styles to dress up your parties, from Victorian underwear to furry characters and more.

"Do you need my help?"
You can talk about gender identity, sexuality and another things with a companion to learn more about the game.

data.short_description: Queer & Chill is a 2D pixel art puzzle game with lots of diversity, a bit of cleverness and a pinch of spiciness.
data.supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, French, Italian, German, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil
data.reviews:
“Queer & Chill proposes a creative tool for teens and adults to understand how different pairing configurations work between different entities of the LGBTIQ+ community and people in general.”
La tinta

“Queer and Chill seeks to validate as much gender diversity as possible in a correct, polite and caring way.”
PressOver

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

content_descriptors.notes: The game represents different forms of sexuality and that’s why it has a sexual connotation, also the game contain sexual references.
